name: warframechart
description: ---------------------------- Live: https://warframchart.ct8.pl **Basic backend functionality**: - Data collection classes for item prices from https://warframe.market, and https://nexus-stats.com (cron_market_git.php, cron_chat_git.php). - Static data collection from (wikiFetch.php):   - http://warframe.wikia.com/wiki/Void_Relic/ByRelic   - http://warframe.wikia.com/wiki/Void_Relic/ByRewards/SimpleTable ( ByRewads.php class)   - http://warframe.wikia.com/wiki/Ducats/Prices  - Store data in files:    - resources/json/TYPE/ORDER_TYPE/ITEM/PLATFORM_graph.json (for market, and nexus)    - resources/json/worldState/FILE.json
author: me
